title: New: Bruno Major – Easily
body:
**Bruno Major** just _gets_ love songs.

Sure, there’s occasionally a slightly sugary sweet tinge to his songwriting, however they manage to come across as effortlessly slick and reassuringly heartfelt. His latest, _Easily_, finds him in full on crooner dive-bar mode, yet knowingly so; proving glowingly affecting. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
